column2: (ED:PT) Admin: Daedric M/P Farm: ENABLED. Disable?

Daedric Mount/Pet Farming refers to the process by which a player can repeatedly spend 25 gold to generate a mount/pet from the marketplace, then immediately sacrifice it to a daedric prince for 50 offmap currency & 25 piety.

This is technically an exploit, but it's extremely tedious for the player concerned, so it's not normally a problem.

However, if you wish to remove the temptation completely, this decision allows you to disable sacrificing mounts/pets where the original owner is the same as the sacrificer.

This "Daedric Mount/Pet Farming" is §Genabled by default§! in all new games, and it can ONLY be enabled/disabled in §Ysingle-player mode§!.
